channel.title: Whats that pongy smell?
channel.description:
- Its pong!
Check out the new game everybody is talking about at www.sexydave.co.uk
Basically I'm shit at Java, let your eyes bleed etc etc. Just thought I'd post it up to get people advice on what I should do.
The source code is attached, and I've got a few ideas on things I'd like to add. Namely I'd like to add multi player but I am sure I've got much to learn in the area of Server/Client implementation.

item.title: Whats that pongy smell?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

The C Programming Language

The C Programming Language (sometimes termed K&R, after its authors' initials) is a computer programming book written by Brian Kernighan and Dennis Ritchie, the latter of whom originally designed and implemented the language, as well as co-designed the Unix operating system with which development of the language was closely intertwined. The book was central to the development and popularization of the C programming language and is still widely read and used today. Because the book was co-author...

C is written mostly by the standards of K&R, Brian Kernighan and Dennis Ritchie.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats that pongy smell?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Hah thanks for the replies guys. I was using eclipse to write it and I just let it do my indenting for me, its bound to be shit.

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:9, topic:226196”]Come to think of it, I don’t think Kate did it any justice. However, it is still bad.

But, my personal opinion: Davidude, don’t use the K&R code format style, it looks bad in Java code.[/quote]
Couple of questions: Who is Kate and what is K&R code format style?

supamagier:

weh, the game is horrible, but if it’s your first ‘big’ project with java, it’s ok.

Yeah its my first applet with Java, I found it quite easy going compared to other stuff I’ve tried to write (For example I was making a program that converted inches to cm’s from a command window).

I will now endeavour to make more shitty apps like this to further my knowledge.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats that pongy smell?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:8, topic:226196”]Ummmm, unless you’re blind, it’s actually perfect.

It’s just a different style.

I don’t see anything wrong with it.
[hr]
Ok, ok, I see a few things. Nothing major though, so idk what you’re bitching about ;P[/quote]
Come to think of it, I don’t think Kate did it any justice. However, it is still bad.

But, my personal opinion: Davidude, don’t use the K&R code format style, it looks bad in Java code.

Read full topic
